import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { detailsProducts } from '../actions/productsAction' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button, Form, FormControl, } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import Message from '../components/Message' import axios from 'axios' const ProductScreen = ({ history, match }) => { const [qty, setQty] = useState(0) const dispatch = useDispatch() const productDetails = useSelector((state) => state.productDetails) const { loading, error, product } = productDetails useEffect(() => { dispatch(detailsProducts(match.params.id)) }, [dispatch, match]) const addCartHandler = () => { if (qty === 0) { setQty(1) } history.push(`/cart/${match.params.id}?qty=${qty}`) } return ( <> {!loading ? ( ) : error ? ( {error} ) : ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: ₹{product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: ₹{product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out Of Stock'} {product.countInStock > 0 && ( Qty setQty(e.target.value)} > {[...Array(product.countInStock).keys()].map( (x) => ( ) )} )} )} ) } export default ProductScreen
